# Decant

> Extract pure, AI-ready content from any web page. Chrome Extension + MCP Server.

Decant is a Chrome extension that extracts clean, structured content from any web page and outputs it in Markdown, JSON, or MCP format. All processing is 100% local â€” no data leaves the user's device.

## MCP Integration

Decant includes an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that lets AI assistants extract web page content directly from Chrome.

- Package: `decant-mcp` (npm)
- Transport: stdio
- Bridge: WebSocket on `ws://localhost:22816`

### Available MCP Tools

- `list_tabs`: List all open Chrome tabs (title, URL, ID)
- `extract_active_tab`: Extract content from the currently active tab
- `extract_tab`: Extract content from a specific tab by ID
- `extract_url`: Open a URL in background, extract content, then close the tab

### Quick Setup

1. Install: `npm install -g decant-mcp`
2. Add to your MCP client config:
   ```json
   { "mcpServers": { "decant": { "command": "decant-mcp" } } }
   ```
3. Enable "MCP Bridge" toggle in the Decant extension popup

## Links

- Chrome Web Store: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/decant/iddjjbfkefeikdjcnhlklblfanhdignj
- Website: https://decant-extension.vercel.app
- Help: https://decant-extension.vercel.app/help
- MCP Guide: https://decant-extension.vercel.app/guides/mcp-bridge
- Extraction Guide: https://decant-extension.vercel.app/guides/extraction
- Full documentation: https://decant-extension.vercel.app/llms-full.txt
